blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: The world has fallen to a monstrous infection, those who remain must band together to survive.  In Upstate New York, heroes and...
caption:
The world has fallen to a monstrous infection, those who remain must band together to survive.  In Upstate New York, heroes and civilians alike are working to build a life, even in the wake of civilisation crumbling.

Marvel Zombies RP open character: Miles Morales

Moderator suggestion for this character:

Miles really misses the days when his enemies were animal themed, but he’s doing his best to be a team player now that things so much more serious.

Survivors hoping to see Miles:
  • Jessica Drew • Spider-Woman
  • Peter Parker • Spider-Man

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted

blog.name: ty-talks-comics
blog.title: Ty Talks Comics
blog.description: A place where I can nerd out about the books I like and rage about the ones I hate!

summary:
Best of this Week: The Amazing Spider-Man #10 (Legacy #811) - Nick Spencer, Humberto Ramos and Michele Bandini
Despite being...
body:
Best of Marvel: Week of November 28th, 2018

Best of this Week: The Amazing Spider-Man #10 (Legacy #811) - Nick Spencer, Humberto Ramos and Michele Bandini

Despite being called Spider-Man, this was less about him and more about Black Cat and Mary Jane and their respective relationships with Spider-Man.

A long time ago, way back when Doc Ock took over Peter’s body, The Superior Spider-Man rocked Black Cat’s shit and tried to arrest her, ending their working relationship and turning her into a ruthless crime boss. This lasted a long time with Black Cat occasionally clashing with heroes and other Spider-people until having a change of heart when confronted by Lee Price in Venom Inc. which forced her to work with Peter again. Recently coming back and not being as super friendly as she was in the past, they begrudgingly began working together again to stop the Thieves Guild from stealing items from superheroes that could be used to save lives.

Felicia shows a courage and willingness to fight that hasn’t been seen since maybe when she was fighting against Miles Morales Spider-Man, but more on the side of good this time. She shows that she still cares about the people of the world and wants to do better again and after the Thieves Guild is taken care of, she and Spider-Man have an amazing heart-to-heart. Felicia tells him that she’d been in a dark place since before Doc Ock even took over his body and it’s because she doesn’t remember who Spider-Man is. In an amazing bit of character development and paying attention to continuity, we see how losing the knowledge of Peter’s identity, especially with how close they were at one point, negatively affected her as a person. We get the idea that maybe she wouldn’t have gone down the dark road if she still knew her former friend, lover and confidant and Peter, being the good guy he is, reveals his identity to Black Cat who cries tears of joy.

Definitely one of the benefits to this part of the story is Ramos’ expressive art and how he uses both good body language and facial expressions to convey emotion. You can feel the pain in Felicia’s eyes, the snark from Peter under his mask and the satisfaction from the Thieves Guild leader after her plot is foiled, but succeeds in making criminals remember to give back to the Thieves Guild for traditions sake. That’s not to say that the action wasn’t great either, it certainly was, but less of a focus for me.

Without a doubt, this is one of my favorite issues of Spider-Man in recent times and I can only hope the quality of characters remains the same, because Nick Spencer knows how to make characters likeable and relatable. Felicia’s pain felt real as did MJ’s worry and I can only hope we see more like this as time goes on.

On the flip side of the coin, in what I’ve always wanted in comics, Mary Jane speaks with a Superhero Family and Friends support group about how she deals with her “boyfriends” double life. (Quotations because she can’t reveal his identity.) She muses about how fun traveling around the city can be and admires the sheer courage and goodness he displays, but also laments the constant possible danger that she’s in and how he possibly wishes he had a partner out there that could watch his back and not have to worry about them at home. But she’s reassured by Jarvis, who runs the group, that maybe he’s as good as he is because of MJ.

—————————————–

Runner Up: Black Panther #6 (Legacy #178) - Ta-Nehisi Coates, Jen Bartel and Triona Farrell

Always more Killmonger.

I’ve kinda been waiting for this for a little while. Where did this Killmonger come from, how did he become so powerful and where did he get his kickass suit from? This issue answers those questions and sets up the next arc oh so nicely.

The issue starts with Killmonger visiting the Chamber of the Wakandan Gods to meet with Bast. We learn that he was originally her chosen warrior before the current T’Challa and that he had won many battle for the Galactic Empire of Wakanda before its rulers saw fit betray him before he could realize that he too had power. He fought back and fled of course, coming upon the Klyntar symbiotes and annihilating the forces of the Old Wakandan Empire. We as readers learn, however, that had Killmonger not lost faith in Bast after she had told him of another champion and listened when she said, “do not have faith in man.” That maybe things could have worked out better for him and that he would not be on this current path that will only lead to ruin for him.

Killmonger doesn’t care. He sees himself with all of the power and an empire behind him and challenges Bast for godhood, defeating and absorbing her essence, making him one with the Panther Goddess.

Daniel Acuna isn’t the artist for this issue, but Jen Bartel is the perfect replacement. Her lines long with Triona Farrell’s colors make everything feel more ethereal and cosmic. In some flashbacks, one can feel how regal the empire was and in other, how bleak the future seemed for Killmonger until coming upon the Klyntar. And the final fight scenes were amazing! Attacks felt heavy, quick and brutal. The colors were vibrant and warm as hell until they became dark and uncomfortable.

I loved every bit of this and highly recommend!

blog.name: fugitivus-from-gerard
blog.title: The Fugitive Fan
blog.description: I basically post Cambridge Latin Course, Hardy Boys, art, Night at the Museum, and funny pages from books and comics. Bi. She/her.

summary:
MJ's reaction to Red Sonja's armor is pretty much every sensible person's reaction.
Meanwhile, the bi side of my brain is very...
body:
MJ’s reaction to Red Sonja’s armor is pretty much every sensible person’s reaction.

Meanwhile, the bi side of my brain is very pro-chainmail bikini armor. I feel like Doctor Jekyll and Mr Hyde.

reblog.comment:
MJ’s reaction to Red Sonja’s armor is pretty much every sensible person’s reaction.

Meanwhile, the bi side of my brain is very pro-chainmail bikini armor. I feel like Doctor Jekyll and Mr Hyde.

trail.content_raw:
MJ’s reaction to Red Sonja’s armor is pretty much every sensible person’s reaction.

Meanwhile, the bi side of my brain is very pro-chainmail bikini armor. I feel like Doctor Jekyll and Mr Hyde.

blog.name: sootwsora
blog.title: www.sootwsora.com
blog.description: صوت وصوره اكبر موقع عربي خاص بالفيديوهات في العالم

tags: تحميل فيلم Spider Man Homecoming 2017 BluRay مترجم
فيلم Spider Man Homecoming 2017 BluRay مترجم
مشاهدة فيلم Spider Man Homecoming 2017 BluRay مترجم
summary:
مشاهدة وتحميل فيلم Spider Man Homecoming 2017 BluRay مترجم

تدور احداث قصة فيلم الاكشن والمغامرة والخيال العلمي Spider-Man:...
caption:
مشاهدة وتحميل فيلم Spider Man Homecoming 2017 BluRay مترجم

تدور احداث قصة فيلم الاكشن والمغامرة والخيال العلمي Spider-Man: Homecoming “الرجل العنكبوت: العودة للوطن” بعد أحداث Captain America: Civil War، يعود بيتر باركر إلى روتينه اليومي الطبيعي ودراسته في مدرسته الثانوية، منصرفًا بالأفكار التي تثبت لنفسه أنه أكثر من مجرد الرجل العنكبوت، ولكن عندما يظهر (النسر) كعدو جديد، سيصبح كل شيء مهم لدى (بيتر) عرضة للتهديد، ويسانده معلمه توني ستارك أو الرجل الحديدي.

reblog.comment:

trail.content_raw:
مشاهدة وتحميل فيلم Spider Man Homecoming 2017 BluRay مترجم

تدور احداث قصة فيلم الاكشن والمغامرة والخيال العلمي Spider-Man: Homecoming “الرجل العنكبوت: العودة للوطن” بعد أحداث Captain America: Civil War، يعود بيتر باركر إلى روتينه اليومي الطبيعي ودراسته في مدرسته الثانوية، منصرفًا بالأفكار التي تثبت لنفسه أنه أكثر من مجرد الرجل العنكبوت، ولكن عندما يظهر (النسر) كعدو جديد، سيصبح كل شيء مهم لدى (بيتر) عرضة للتهديد، ويسانده معلمه توني ستارك أو الرجل الحديدي.

summary: So i saw a post that was like “I love how all these fics have peter with curly hair when his hair isn’t curly lmao” I...
body:
So i saw a post that was like “I love how all these fics have peter with curly hair when his hair isn’t curly lmao”

I respectfully disagree, and here is my proof: 

also this is his best look in the movie i wanna draw this
